data.name: 光影の塔
data.detailed_description:
English version is in preparation for now.

An online 3D shooting game where players divided into 2 teams, "Light" and "Shadow" and buttles 4 vs 4 in max.
Players ride on a machine which moves automatically and occupy "Tower" which are placed in the stage whose concept is the near future.

Power Up Item

There are power up items in the stage.
Strengthen your player by getting power up items.

Various Weapons

Use various weapons by picking up weapons which is dropped in the stage.
Using weapons well is the way to win the game.

Unique Two Stages

There are unique two stages.
  • Reversi Space: A stage where towers between same team tower breaks. In this stage like real-time reversi, players should think about strategy.
  • Cyber City: A stage which is three-dimensional with the concept of the near future. It is recommended when playing with many people.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8000T / AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics or equivalent AMD gpus
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent AMD gpus
  • DirectX: Version 10
